question: Analyze the social media engagement trends for technology companies over the last year.

subtasks.task: Identify technology companies from the CompanyInfo table that are active and have posted on social media within the last year.

Gather social media engagement metrics from the relevant social media detail tables (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube). Focus on likes, comments, and shares for each company within the last year.
Consolidate the engagement metrics and categorize by company to identify which companies have the highest engagement across different platforms.
Analyze trends in engagement over the year by comparing monthly metrics for these technology companies to observe seasonal variations in social media activity.
Create visual representations (charts or graphs) to showcase the findings from the engagement metrics analysis across the selected technology companies.
